title: The Stomping Land 0.5.2 Hotfix + LumaEmu (Hotfix Only)
description:
Extract into stomping land game folder


Edit LumaEmu.ini in Binaries/Win32 to change username and join multiplayer servers


to join multiplayer servers

edit the LumaEmu.ini 


[Steam2Wrapper]
GameExe = UDK.exe 127.0.0.1

change 127.0.0.1 to server ip

example(24/7 working hotfix server):

[Steam2Wrapper]
GameExe = UDK.exe 68.5.171.1:7777

Then Start up Steam2WrapperLauncher in Binaries/Win32 and you should be able to join the server.
